syllabus_intro: IMAGIC Graphic Design Course Syllabus is one of the most professional, complete & industry-oriented. In 6 months practical training program we cover five software needed for graphic design. Check below for software details.

modules.title: Adobe Photoshop CC
modules.description: Adobe Photoshop CC is a very popular Raster software for image editing. Most demanding Graphic design software. Itâ€™s needed for different kinds of design purposes, starting from design for Digital Marketing, photo editing, web page design etc. Here you will learn all kind of photo editing tools details and using method.

modules.title: Corel Draw
modules.description: Corel Draw is very popular and useful Vector software for print media Graphics design. You can design Flex, leaflets, banner or anything needed for advertisement & printing industry. Coreldraw has a powerful color management engine and superior prepress tools. If youâ€™re in screen printing, embroidery, direct-to-garment printing or apparel business coreldraw tools can give you right design for your business.

modules.title: Adobe Ilustrator CC
modules.description: Adobe Illustrator CC is a very popular Vector software for creative graphic designing. Best logo designing software. Also 3D text design, vector art can be done in Illustrator.

modules.title: Adobe In-Design CC
modules.description: Adobe In-Design CC is a popular Vector software for desktop publishing. Also used for E-Publishing.

modules.title: Adobe LightRoom CC
modules.description: Adobe LightRoom CC is a Raw Photo color correction software. It is used for professionally retouching images. Very much used by Photographers & Graphics Designers.

syllabus_intro: The IMAGIC Professional Video Editing Course is a 4-month, job-demanding program designed for aspiring editors in Kolkata, offering a 100% job guarantee. The training focuses on three key Adobe software applications: Photoshop CC, Premiere CC, and Audition CC, teaching students how to create a proper audio-visual video, including graphics and voice editing, from basic to advanced levels.

modules.title: Photoshop
modules.description: Graphics is one of the creative fields that relate to every industry. Here, you will learn to create proper graphics that help the editing industry from all aspects. From making a YouTube thumbnail to blending video backgrounds, news jackets, name plates, creative lower thirds, movie end credits and PNG images, you can do it all in Photoshop. In this module you will learn image editing, image selection, Typography, image retouching for creating a good quality video for audience.

modules.title: Premiere Pro
modules.description: Video Editing is an important part start your journey in Editing Career. First you will learn project setup in Adobe Premiere CC .Then you'll learn how to import video footage, graphics, audio clips, music, voice over into project and then after rough cut into tittle. After video footage arrangement in timeline second most important part is audio. We need to balance audio of video footage or add some music, sound effect, voice over as per the need of the video editing. After arranging video and audio we need to put some text titles in video as per the need. Then we will learn how to export video from Premiere Pro.We have already learned basic video editing. Now we will use some advance features of Premier Pro to make our editing more attractive. Transition and Effects are very important part of video editing. When jump from one video shot to another we use transition. Use of different transition in different footage need lots of concept & knowledge. Some times also we need to change or adjust color of footage so we use Effects in video editing. We have already learned Titling in Video Editing. Now we will learn advance titling like rolling, scrolling etc. Importing animated titling into video editing. We have heard of VFX ( Visual Effects) seen mostly in Film and movies. Chroma is a important part of VFX. During video shooting Green or Blue screen is used in background. Then we remove this color in video editing. For this we need to understand and learn Chroma Key removal in Premiere Pro.

modules.title: Adobe Audition CC
modules.description: In the very first step, you will learn about how to set up the Adobe Audition Software and about the subject. Apart from that, you will also learn the overall concept of the necessity of the subject, functions, and the process in depth. In this section, you will learn how to record, edit, and apply effects to audio clips, as well as record and adjust multitrack sessions in Adobe Audition and work directly with audio tracks. Here you will also explore the Adobe Audition user interface, and how to apply effects with multitrack sessions & perform key tasks for optimizing audio with the Essential Sound panel. Though you re not a professional, by using the essential sound panel, you will learn how to achieve high-quality professional audio. Audition sound effects are always royalty-free, fully uncompressed files that ensure quality sound perfect for video production. Adobe Audition helps you to learn and understand the sequence and how to send it through a Dynamic Link. The result is that it will automatically rearrange any song to fit for any duration with Remix. All you will learn here on practically how to repair and restore your audio files by using the Amplitude Statistics panel, spectral frequency display, adaptive noise reduction, and diagnostics panel.

syllabus_intro: At IMAGIC Digital Marketing Course, you will learn each step thoroughly by doing practical projects. Digital Marketing isn't Magic but a Method. Successful marketers use the method properly to get succeed. Here, you will cover every aspect of the digital marketing syllabus with real case studies. This helps you to understand how the industry responds to digital marketing. The area of digital marketing covers every aspect that you work in the industry.

modules.title: Fundamental Of Digital Marketing
modules.description: The very first step you will learn in the Digital Marketing course is the fundamentals of digital marketing. This covers the need and importance of learning digital marketing. Also student will learn free business listing directories, about their uses and business growing strategies.

modules.title: Photoshop for Digital Marketing
modules.description: A Digital Marketer need Graphic Design support for everyday engagement. So that reason we provide to our student Photoshop knowledge for creating a Digital Marketing Graphics. Also we will cover Canva for quick ready made designs. In this module student will also learn to make YouTube Thumbnail, Facebook post, Banner, Web template etc.

modules.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
modules.description: Search Engine Optimization is one of the key parts of digital marketing and it uses to achieve greater visibility and higher rankings in organic search results. You will learn - 1) On-page SEO 2) Off-page SEO 3) Technical SEO On-page SEO requires some technical parts to understand and implement with proper keywords to optimizing web page content for search engines and users. In simple words, it includes optimizing title tags, content, internal links, and URLs. On the other hand, Off-page SEO includes the activities that are off of a website to increase the websiteâ€™s search engine rankings. In simple words, Off-page SEO includes backlinks buildings, brand searches, and more engagement as well as shares on social media. Here, you will learn both on-page and off-page in accordance with practical projects.

modules.title: Adobe Premiere for Digital Marketing video content
modules.description: YouTube is now an important part in Digital Marketing. We all use it for video content publish purpose. This will help to develop video content editing for YouTube in Adobe Premiere Pro.

modules.title: Google Ads/ PPC
modules.description: Pay-per-click (PPC) marketing plays a key role in the digital marketing channel. It presents a significant opportunity for digital marketers to grow their traffic and conversion metrics in the paid versions. Google Ads (formerly known as Google AdWords) is one of the most popular PPC advertising platforms that enables businesses to create ads that appear on Googleâ€™s search engine and other Google properties. Here you will learn about the PPC and its importance for the website and how to do it the right way.

syllabus_intro: In Adobe InDesign all projects are created can be shared in both digital and print formats. InDesign is an industry-standard for publishing design and is used by graphic designers, artists, publishers, and marketing professionals. It provides users a simplified way to create professional pages which can be published and distributed in print or online. It is used to create flyers, brochures, magazines, newspapers, posters, business cards, postcards, stickers, comics, and many other types of documents or visual communication.

modules.title: E-Book Publication
modules.description: Design your eBook faster and smarter with InDesign tools. If youâ€™re looking to launch your first e-book, Adobe InDesign would be a great tool to publish. By using your creative ideas, perfect layout, and fonts you can create a perfect e-book for your readers by adding artwork for publishing.

modules.title: Print Publication
modules.description: InDesign is a powerful print publication tool that is used by graphic designers, artists, publishers, and marketing professionals for printing creative flyers, brochures, magazines, newspapers, e-books, posters, business cards, postcards, stickers, comics, and many other types of documents or visual communication.

modules.title: Desktop Publishing
modules.description: Desk Top Publishing (DTP) is special software that integrates text and images. This software can be used to create the layout for a wide range of different publications, such as - Newspapers, Magazines, Brochures, Posters, Flyer, Leaflets, Catalogue books and e-books, PDF, Web Pages, Ads Banner, Newsletter, Design of Resume, etc.

modules.title: Newspaper Column Layout
modules.description: Newspaper layouts creation is one of the most traditional forms of graphic design and typographic layout. But the columned style makes a simply visual impact. With InDesign, you can structure Newspaper columns, margins, and grids to organize your front page design, and also create a newspaper template for creating other editorial designs, such as magazines, flyers, or brochures.

modules.title: Digital Magazine creation
modules.description: Mobile devices are a great way to expand your reach. To turn out any traditional print books and magazines into digital content you can use InDesign. With Adobe InDesign you can share your big story as a digital magazine. Massive savings on printing costs and eco-friendliness are the main advantages of using a digital magazine

modules.title: Online Document Creation
modules.description: Use InDesign when creating any online documents that are graphically rich with highly designed layouts with the combination of both text and graphics. It is also useful for creating flyers, brochures, magazines, newsletters, e-books, and other print documents with a complex layout that needs beyond the capabilities of standard work.

syllabus_intro: Adobe Lightroom Course is perfect for Photographers or in the other sense, anyone who is passionate about photo editing or Photography, Lightroom is the Golden Key for them. This Adobe Lightroom is a perfect tool for your photography works or portfolio that helps to speed up your workflow and keep your photos nice and organized. At, IMAGIC chandni chowk, you will learn the top features of using Adobe Lightroom from industry experts like never before.

modules.title: Improve and Repair Photos
modules.description: Lightroom is a perfect tool to work with Photoshop. With Adobe Lightroom single tool, you will learn how to improve as well as repairs your pictures in a combined format through import, organize, and photo editing, and management.

modules.title: Remove Objects from Photos
modules.description: You will also learn how Adobe Lightroom will help you to remove unnecessary objects from the photos. By using the healing brush tool you can easily remove any unwanted object from your photo.

modules.title: Working with Layers Panel
modules.description: Adobe Lightroom, help you in different ways. You can use layers to perform tasks for compositing multiple images, adding text to any image, or even adding any vector graphic shapes. You can also easily apply a layer style to add any special effect like a drop shadow or a glow.

modules.title: Use creative Effects
modules.description: A perfect photo depends on both the subject matter and the final look. In this section, you will learn how to apply a photo in Adobe Lightroom as a starting point for your edits to create a stylish and creative effect. You can explore many ways to use Lightroom to make your most powerful images ever.

modules.title: Make Perfect Photo composition
modules.description: Whether desktop, mobile device, or online, with Lightroom, you can easily crop and rotate the images to find the right size and aspect ratio within your framework. This photo editing tool helps you to crop, invert, and straighten the photos to express your creativity the way you want to see.

modules.title: Add colors & Image Noice Reduction
modules.description: With Adobe Lightroom, you will learn how to enhance sharpness, detail, and textures using a clarity slider. Apart from that, this also helps you to reveal hidden details and colors in photos. While on the other hand, you can reduce digital noise in your photos which is usually caused by low light or a high ISO setting on your camera.

syllabus_intro: Professional FCP Video Editing Course with VFX makes you job-ready as a video editor for TV Channel, Mega Serials, Advertisement, and Documentary Film as well as digital film editing, etc. Most final versions of video recordings have undergone some type of editing such as Color correction, Exposure adjustment, Blurring, Frame cropping, Trimming, Re-sequencing, Cross dissolving, Cut-aways, Fade in/fade out, etc. This course will cover the most demanding software for the video editing industry starting from Photoshop to FCP.

modules.title: Photoshop
modules.description: Professionals to amateur anybody can learn Adobe Photoshop which is a raster graphic software and is used for commercial to personal image editing or graphic designing. It is one of the most demanding software that is used for Animation and Multimedia designing purposes. From Graphic designer to Web designer, and from Video editor, to Animator everybody needs Adobe Photoshop. here you will learn Image Editing, Colour Correction, Photo Restoration, Graphic Designing, Digital Marketing Graphics, YouTube Thumbnails, etc.

modules.title: Audition
modules.description: Adobe Audition is a professional audio workstation that gives you the knowledge to capture or record, edit and put effects on sound, voice-over, etc. It is a powerful toolset that includes multitrack, waveform, and spectral display for creating, mixing, editing, and restoring any audio content. This comprehensive audio workstation is designed to accelerate video production and audio finishing with a polished mix of pristine sound.

modules.title: Premiere Pro
modules.description: Adobe Premiere Pro is the best video editing software for film, TV, and the web. It is a very user-friendly and non-linear video editing software. Professionals to amateur anybody can learn Adobe Premiere Pro and it is used for commercial to personal video editing. With this powerful video editing software, you can easily Edit any footage in any format, from 8K to virtual reality. The best part is that it also works seamlessly with other apps and services, such as Photoshop, After Effects, Audition, etc.

modules.title: Final Cut Pro (FCP)
modules.description: Take your creativity to the next level with FCP (Final Cut Pro). With this improved high-performance metal engine you can take your projects and transform them easily into custom sizes for social media. FCP allows you to edit more complex projects and work with larger frame sizes at blazing speeds. FCP accelerates post-production with its stunning new features and an intuitive design.

modules.title: After Effects
modules.description: After Effects is one of the best industry-leading VFX and Motion graphics software that is used in VFX production houses, motion graphics designing, corporate presentation, etc. With this software, you can take any idea to the next level and make it move. You can easily create any cinematic film titles, intros, and transitions. You can also remove an object from any clip and even animate a logo or character and design it in a 3D space.

syllabus_intro: After effects training in Kolkata at IMAGIC chandni chowk. is the most popular layer-based compositing software in Kolkata. needed for creating the advertisement, video title, motion graphic, etc. Here you'll learn the core terminology of film, video, and animation and get familiar with the After Effects interface that results in understanding how to build compositions, work with layers, animate, add effects and render.

modules.title: Create Compositions
modules.description: Here you will learn the basics of creating the composition in Adobe After Effects, with multiple layers by adding animation, applying effects, and more. You will learn how to record multiple keyframes to create animation and also how to import assets for use in a project.

modules.title: Animation & Text Creation
modules.description: In this section, you will learn the fundamentals to create and animate text layers by adding text to a composition. Apart from that, you will learn how to apply and edit prebuilt text animations by creating per-character animation. With After Effects you can easily create graphic elements by separating text from a background using Shape layers.

modules.title: Manipulation of 3d layers & Motion Graphics
modules.description: Here student will learn setting and using of different type of layers. Also students experienced project work like layer in animations. Along with that utility of info panel, frame setting, graph editor and key movements also will be taught. Motion graphics in After effect means a part of graphics designing in which we animate different properties of any object with the help of some features of this software for giving motion in that property of that object.

modules.title: Paint, Clone & Rotoscope Layers
modules.description: In 3 months course module paint, clone ,masking this all are play an important role in after effects software. So students will learn about different paint brush options, Stoke options, video cloning, cloning utility and many more options.

modules.title: Camera Tracking
modules.description: In this module student will learn how to work with Camera, different Camera options, utility of Camera in 2D and 3D composition and camera effects. Also in this chapter Animation with Camera, working with null and camera included.

modules.title: Final Project
modules.description: At the end of the syllabus students need to get ready a final project using tools. Because not only learning enough for a person, practically hands-on project work are also important part of this.

In Present day there is a huge demand of Video Editor. If you get enough skill and passion in this field then we are happy to advise you and deeply encourage you to pursue the career in Video Editing field.

syllabus_intro: NSOU DIPLOMA IN VIDEO EDITING is a one year professional job oriented course. Course consist six modules of two months each. Students will learn all the Video Editing & compositing concepts & techniques along with software like Photoshop, Audition, Premiere, After FX etc. After successful course completion students will get Job placement support & interview calls from IMAGIC along with Diploma certificate from NSOU.

modules.title: Fundamental of Video Making Process using sound & video editing software
modules.description: Start with a lesson to understand Video Editing Software adobe premiere and sound engineering adobe audition role in Video making process.

modules.title: Composting professional graphics for digital film & tv using photoshop
modules.description: In this module you will learn how to use the Photoshop for Youtube, Digital flim or Television. Also learn the Art of Video editing using graphics in Photoshop.

modules.title: Understanding video filming process ( Basic pre prod & production workflow) theory, sound recording & exporting for tv & radio using Adobe Audition
modules.description: Working as a video editor it's not easy. You have to learn the whole process behind the production work. Create a project using audio files, multi track, waveform effects and noise reduction techniques in adobe audition. Importing videos and working with video clips and Export audio file suitable for professional T.V. or Radio production.

modules.title: Advance level Filming/Video Editing with colour correction using Adobe Premiere (Post Production)
modules.description: In advance level of video editing you used the most professional techniques with adobe premiere. But if you don't know how to use it, it will produce incomplete projects. So, our faculty will teach you editing process, color labels, croma keying, CG transitions, color correction process and exporting a final movie technique & shortcuts.

modules.title: Special effects & Motion Graphics Animation Training Adobe After Effects
modules.description: Here you will learn After Effects workspace. Creating composition, motion effects, audio spectrum effects, text animations & effects, kinetic typography techniques and many more tools you will learn in one course.

modules.title: Final Documentary Film or video making
modules.description: After learning full audio and video editing IMAGIC students will do a complete project from start to finish.

syllabus_intro: Students/Job Seekers â€“ Job seekers or Students of any stream after 10+2 willing to start Full / Part time career in Digital Marketing can Join this course. Freelancers â€“ Those who are willing to work as a Freelance Digital Marketer can get immediate benefit from this course. Small/Medium Business Owners â€“ Business owners who have either an online business wants to get leads or want to switch offline business to online can join. Housewives / Retired Person â€“ Anybody wants to earn extra income by working from home, this could be your ideal course to learn.

modules.title: Digital Marketing Introduction
modules.description: You will start with Digital Marketing fundamentals in first semester. What is Digital Marketing, Different types of Digital Marketing and Digital Marketing strategies to start with. We will also cover Google my business, Social Media optimization like - Facebook, YouTube etc. AI, ChatGPT, Prompt Engineering and doubt clearing.

modules.title: Photoshop for Digital Marketing Graphics
modules.description: In Digital Marketing we need strong Graphic Design support. For that reason we will learn Photoshop for creating stunning Digital Marketing graphics. Also we will cover Canva for quick ready made designs. These semester will help us to create digital marketing graphics like YouTube thumbnail, Facebook post and banners etc

modules.title: SEO - Search Engine Optimization
modules.description: Search Engine Optimization is one of the key aspects of Digital Marketing . Without SEO a Digital Marketing campaign cannot be successful . In this course, you will understand the whole process of SEO practically with live project work. This will cover Technical-SEO, ON-PAGE-SEO as well as OFF-PAGE SEO. We will also learn Google Search Console, Google Analytics and keyword research for mastering SEO.

modules.title: Premiere for Digital Marketing Video Content
modules.description: YouTube is an important part in Digital Marketing. We need video content for this purpose. This semester will help you to develop video content for YouTube in Adobe Premiere Pro.

modules.title: PPC & Social Media Marketing
modules.description: PPC - Pay Per Click is an important part of Digital Marketing paid promotion activities. We will learn Google AdWords to run various campaigns like Search Ads, Display Ads etc. SMM- Social Media Marketing is also an important part of paid promotion activities. You will learn Facebook promotion, LinkedIn promotion etc.

modules.title: Live Projects
modules.description: No skill development is complete without practical training. So we kept a whole semester for practical training with live Digital Marketing projects to make students job ready.
